EAScenario.name: Local Community App
EAScenario.description:
Value proposition: Social isolation is a major concern for elderlies. Old people tend to loose contacts with their friends and relatives, they feel abandoned, they can get depressed and start to develop risky habits due to the lack of human contacts. This scenarios is about creating an applications that helps them to keep in touch with family, with other elderly communities, and get involved in local happenings. Basic functionality:
  • Create a communication channel between the user and the family with more recent technology (video conference, textual messages).
  • Building a social network or transferring/integrating existing networks.
  • Reminds relatives and friends related events (e.g. birthdays) and suggest a contact.
  • Access to local community events, describe them, remind the events.
  • Allow creating events and activities in local community.
Pros:
  • Demonstrate how our platform makes use of "contextual" information (in a wide sense of the word: context is not only localization).
  • Demonstrate how the platform can improve a social problem. This could attract possible users and service providers.
  • Relatively cheap to be implemented.
  • Proves the integrability of the platform with legacy services.
Cons:
  • The difficulty is to build something usable for the elderly. Audio/video communication should not be a concern, but building a social network is challenging.
  • The application has two classes of users: elderly and relatives: this means considering two kinds of interactions. Elderly should ha unified easy interface, but relatives could be young and technically skilled should be given the possibility to choose other means of communication. (e.g. the video communication is done on the UnievrsAAL PC on one side, and using a 3G mobile phone on the other side).
  • The integration with other services can be difficult, for instance how would you integrate with facebook? Facebook itself may be too difficult for an elderly, some adaptation must be done.
